translations.english: There was a great amnesty for the world.
In the second month, the edict said: "I desire to reduce levies greatly.

translations.chinese: 今獻未有程，吏或多賦以為獻，而諸侯王尤多，民疾之。
translations.english: Now tribute has no standard. Officials sometimes levy much to make tribute, and the feudal lords and kings especially much. The people suffer from it.

translations.chinese: 令諸侯王、通侯常以 十月朝獻，及郡各以其口數率，人歲六十三錢，以給獻費。」
translations.english: Command that feudal lords and kings, noble marquises regularly make court tribute in the tenth month, and commanderies each according to their population rate, per person sixty-three cash per year, to provide tribute expenses."

translations.chinese: 又曰：「蓋聞王者莫高於周文，伯者莫高於齊桓，皆待賢人而成名。
translations.english: He also said: "I have heard that among kings none was higher than Zhou Wen, among hegemons none was higher than Qi Huan. All relied on worthy men to achieve fame.
